p: The organic extracts were obtained from 10 0.010 g of air-dried aerial parts and powdered plants in 200 ml of methanol, ethyl acetate or acetone after sonication at room temperature for 1 h. The organic extracts were filtered and the solvent was removed in a rotary evaporator at 40–50 °C. The crude extracts (21 samples) were stored at 20 mg/mL in DMSO.
